    • Uses of IDiagramGraphic in org.modelio.api.diagram

      Subinterfaces of IDiagramGraphic in org.modelio.api.diagram 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IDiagramDrawing
      Diagram drawings are diagram graphics that are by nature not related to a model elements.
      interface  IDiagramLink
      This class represents a DiagramGraphic of the 'link' kind.
      interface  IDiagramNode
      This class represents a DiagramGraphic of the 'node' kind.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Methods in org.modelio.api.diagram that return types with arguments of type IDiagramGraphic 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<IDiagramGraphic> IDiagramHandle.getDiagramGraphics(MObject element)
      Returns the list of diagram graphic representing (ie: for which the getElement() method does return the element of) the given reference in this diagram or an empty list if none is found.
      List<IDiagramGraphic> IDiagramHandle.unmask(MObject element, int x, int y)
      Unmask a model element in a diagram.
      List<IDiagramGraphic> IDiagramGraphicFactory.unmask(MObject element, int x, int y)
      Unmask a model element in a diagram.
      Methods in org.modelio.api.diagram with parameters of type IDiagramGraphic 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IDiagramHandle.mask(IDiagramGraphic graphic)
      Mask a graphical element in the diagram.

      This class represents a diagram graphic for the diagram itself.
